t: 5:2*r The Hebrew word for defiling*i skin*i disease*i , traditionally translated “leprosy,” was used for various diseases affecting the skin.
5:6*r Or woman*i who*i commits*i any*i wrong*i common*i to*i mankind*i
5:15*r That is, probably about 3 1/2 pounds or about 1.6 kilograms
5:21*r That is, may he cause your name to be used in cursing (see Jer. 29:22); or, may others see that you are cursed; similarly in verse 27.
